alert.note: Alert for Eastern Clay; Eastern Marion; Eastern Putnam; Inland Flagler; Inland St. Johns; Western Putnam (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 16 at 5:36PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT NORTHWESTERN FLAGLER... SOUTHWESTERN ST. JOHNS...NORTHEASTERN MARION...CENTRAL PUTNAM AND EAST CENTRAL CLAY COUNTIES THROUGH 615 PM EDT... At 536 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Federal Point to Lake Delancy. Movement was southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts around 40 mph and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Palatka, Pomona Park, Hastings, Salt Springs, East Palatka, Lake Delancy, Fruitland, Bostwick, Federal Point, and Orange Mills. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Clay; Eastern Marion; Eastern Putnam; Inland Flagler; Inland St. Johns; Western Putnam
